message.name: ERR_APPEAL_REOPEN_HISTORY_FV_CASENOTCLOSED
message.locale: You cannot reopen a hearing case unless it has a status of closed.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_REOPEN_HISTORY_FV_NOHEARINGDECISION
message.locale: You cannot reopen a hearing case unless a hearing decision exists for the case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_REOPEN_HISTORY_FV_NOHEARING
message.locale: You cannot reopen this hearing case as the final hearing has not been completed.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_REOPEN_HISTORY_FV_PARTICIPANTSPRESENT
message.locale: You cannot reopen this hearing case as all the required participants were present at the last hearing.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_REOPEN_HISTORY_FV_CASEIDEMPTY
message.locale: A valid case has not been selected.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_REOPEN_HISTORY_FV_REASONCODEEMPTY
message.locale: A reopen reason code has not been selected.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_REOPEN_HISTORY_FV_REOPENDATEEMPTY
message.locale: A reopen date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_REOPEN_HISTORY_FV_USERNAMEEMPTY
message.locale: Cannot reopen the hearing case as the username of the person reopening it has not been set.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_REOPEN_HISTORY_FV_REOPENDATEINVALID
message.locale: The reopen date must be after the end date of the hearing case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_REOPEN_HISTORY_FV_CASEOPEN
message.locale: You cannot reopen this hearing case as an open appeal is already associated with the case.

message.name: ERR_APPEAL_REOPEN_HISTORY_FV_REOPENDDATE
message.locale: The reopen date must not be in the future.
